programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Japan: Islands of Extremes
programme.desc: Japan's 7,000 islands stretch for over 2,400 km, and cover an incredible range of climates. Winter in the central and northern islands can be savage, but summer in the sweltering southern islands couldn't be more different.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel the flow of some of Canada's tallest waterfalls, and an endless network of rivers and creeks provides the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise
programme.desc: The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. From just a few meters wide, to hundreds of kilometers across, each of the over 7,000 islands are different, and each has its own unique wildlife.

programme.title: George And The Dragon

programme.title: The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes

programme.title: The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes

programme.title: Captain Sabertooth

programme.title: Soccer Nanny

programme.title: Beautiful Serengeti: Competition

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia Freaks of Nature

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand The Wild Heart
programme.desc: Thailand is a land of extremes. A country shaped by wild forces, where animals face tough challenges to survive. Yet they have evolved into some of the most iconic and successful species on the planet.

programme.title: Britain's Lost Battlefields With Rob Bell: The Battle of Naseby

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Grand Union Canal

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Leeds & Liverpool Canal

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 29

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 30
programme.desc: Simon & Meg vs. Steve & Helen. National pride is on the line as two teams go head to head in the sudden death cook-off. It's neck and neck in the closest battle so far. After a nail-bitingly close contest, one team will be eliminated.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 31
programme.desc: The judges have a shock announcement that shakes things up in the competition. In another surprise twist, the teams will face their harshest critics yet with the arrival of a jury. The teams are left dumbfounded when they see who's coming to dinner.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 32
programme.desc: The remaining teams will battle it out in an all-in cook-off. The jury have their knives out again and together with the judges will determine tonight's lowest scoring teams.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 33
programme.desc: Tonight, teams continue to impress as they bring out their best culinary skills in a difficult challenge. The jury will determine the two weakest teams who will go straight into a sudden death cook-off. Who will buckle under the heat and go home?

programme.title: The New Detectives: A Federal Offense
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Witness To Terror
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a black box.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Coroner Investigator
programme.desc: CI: Coroner Investigator will reveal the most in-depth look to date into the science of death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Out To Kill
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: Forensic scientists find clues written in blood as they investigate the deaths of three women killed by the men who once loved them.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the contestants' ability to communicate and work together with a three entre relay race, with the winners getting a helicopter tour and a caviar tasting.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon reunites the contenders with their loved ones before challenging them to jazz up some basic cuts of meat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team of previous winners returns to challenge the remaining contestants; each team designs its own menus for dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final five chefs must impress tough critics with a gourmet burger; a huge misstep brings dinner service to a halt; one chef is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the grand finale just around the corner, the remaining chefs are challenged to replicate a sample dish using taste, texture and sight alone. The winner is rewarded with a $1,000 shopping spree before another taxing evening service begins.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the penultimate episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series nears its climax. Three contestants soon become two as Gordon names the second finalist.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on one of his biggest challenges yet as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the challenge as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a classic 1958 Harley Davidson and a 1984 Kawasaki police cruiser.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1944 vintage firetruck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a wild 60's inspired show truck. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of Aces
programme.desc: Garth Doull trained to be a policeman but the lure of the race track saw him swap sides of the law to become a consummate con-man. On the 8th of September 1989, his body was found floating in Wellington harbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy Kings Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ducks On The Pond
programme.desc: Tess tries to realize some cash from Drovers Run without hurting Claire. One of the shearers Claire hired disappears; did he leave because his wife was in labor, or was he murdered?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Don't Mess With The Girls
programme.desc: It's time for the annual rodeo. Claire wants to ride Jack's horse Sirocco to a championship, and Tess tries to get Becky to report being raped.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Who's The Boss
programme.desc: Claire buys a herd of thin sheep at an auction to fatten up and resell. Jodi finds she did badly on her examination. Tess applies her mother's therapist techniques to encourage the women at Drovers Run to open up emotionally and bond.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Taking The Reins
programme.desc: Tess tries to improve her riding skills. Sirocco becomes severely ill. Jodi wants to go out at night and party like she thinks Becky does.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reality Bites
programme.desc: Meg and Claire discover more about Becky's home life when she temporarily returns to work at her parents' truck stop.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Pride And Joy
programme.desc: A feral bull is wreaking havoc at Drovers Run and Tess trades in her cappuccino machine for a daily cow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canadas largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive behind the scenes look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canadas largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Voices of Pain
programme.desc: On this episode TAPS heads back to the fan favorite; Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, Kentucky, an abandoned tuberculosis hospital haunted by its former patients and staff.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dont Forget About Us
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Franklin, Kentucky to investigate Octagon Hallwhere secret tunnels have been found under the house, which are believed to have hidden confederate soldiersduring the civil war.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Nemesis
programme.desc: With his family working like a well-oiled machine, Jerry goes after a big contract offered up by a local car dealer.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Up the Creek
programme.desc: With Ronnie Creek and his crew breathing down the Campbells' necks, it's going to take a full team effort to win the big contract they're all after.

programme.title: American Hoggers: New Recruit
programme.desc: With Krystal's thumb injury sidelining her for 4-6 weeks, Robert tries to find a replacement, but family tensions resurface when he recruits a girl with zero experience.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Ranger Come Home
programme.desc: After another new recruit fails to make the cut, the Campbells recognize Krystal is irreplaceable and take another job despite being shorthanded.

programme.title: American Hoggers: The End is Near
programme.desc: Determined to take down his nemesis once and for all, Jerry puts his good name (and the Campbells' paychecks) on the line: whoever catches the most hogs gets all the money - but it's not long before Jerry's plans go up in smoke.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Pistol Whipped
programme.desc: It's the last job of the year and after a season of close calls and hard falls it could be the last hunt of Jerry's career.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Before the Storm
programme.desc: After winning last season's showdown, Jerry Campbell is the Hog Boss in Texas. Business is booming, but Krystal, Robert and Lea aren't seeing any of the profits.

programme.title: Ax Men: Getting a Leg Up
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, the Papac crew is moving on to the most remote and dangerous site of their season.

programme.title: Ax Men: Take This Log and Shove It
programme.desc: Joe and Coatsey's arguments threaten to bring the job to a grinding halt. Meanwhile at Rygaard, Gabe gives son Aiden a baptism of fire in the rigging, which pushes him to breaking point and raises doubts about his future in the family business.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers: Abby

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the worlds most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: Arthur: Grandma Thora Appreciation Day/Fern's Slumber Party
programme.desc: Arthur and D.W. are planning a surprise party for Grandma Thora. But amidst the party-planning mayhem, they forget about the guest of honor! Then, shy Fern hosts a slumber party at her mother's urging.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym
programme.desc: When Arthur doesn't fit into his costume for the play, he's shocked to learn that he's gotten "husky-sized." He gets serious about getting in shape. Muffy found the perfect place to take pictures with her new digital camera: the jungle gym.

programme.title: Arthur: Speak Up Francine/Waiting for Snow
programme.desc: The local creek is polluted and pesticide run-off is to blame. Francine is determined to get the word out at the annual Earth Day rally. Ladonna can't wait to experience her first blizzard, if only the weather would cooperate.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Book Battle/On the Buster Scale
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary has just instituted IRP; a program where kids can earn points (and prizes!) for reading. Then, Buster and Brain never agree on movies. Buster rates every film a 10+, while Brain doesn't seem to like anything.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Library Card/Arthur's Big Hit
programme.desc: When D.W. discovers that she can get her own library card, she rejoices at the world of books waiting for her. And, is it ever okay to hit someone? Sometimes you just get so mad, you wanna....pow! Right??

programme.title: The Rhythm and Roots of Arthur
programme.desc: Pack your bags, buckle your seatbelts, and get ready for an ARTHUR road trip to the family farm! Arthurs Great-Grand Uncle Theo is celebrating his 85th birthday, so the Reads (and Buster) are off to Ohio to join in the festivities.

programme.title: Arthur: Love Notes For Muffy/D.W. Blows The Whistle
programme.desc: When Muffy tries to bribe the judges at the school science fair, Francine and The Brain plot revenge. And D.W., a newly-deputized Junior Safety Officer, has a reputation for being a strict enforcer of the rules--well, OK, a tattle-tale.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Kurt Lischka
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters looks at how German housewife Beate Klarsfeld and her husband Serge helped track down former Paris Gestapo chief Kurt Lishka. Lishka ordered the arrest and murder of over 33,000 Jews.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Joseph Mengele
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Mossad agents from Israel spent nearly thirty years tracking the notorious Nazi physician Josef Mengele. After the war, Mengele flees to Argentina where he lives a relatively nondescript life.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Erich Priebke
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how, a half-century after the war, American journalists track down former Gestapo officer Erich Priebke. Priebke who was responsible for some of Italy's worst atrocities fled to Argentina after the war.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Klaus Barbie
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters looks at how the husband and wife team of Serge and Beate Klarsfeld worked tirelessly to have Nazi war criminal Klaus Barbie extradited from Bolvia to stand trail in France.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Adolf Eichmann
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines the capture of Adolf Eichmann considered by many to be one of the main architects of the Holocaust. Eichmann was captured outside of his home near Buenos Aires in Argentina by Mossad agents.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Herbert Cukurs
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Israeli secret service agents traveled to South America to assassinate Nazi war criminal Herbert Cukurs. Known as the Hangman of Riga, Cukurs was responsible for the deaths of over 30,000 Latvian Jews.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Harold & Armani
programme.desc: Harold found his match with a beautiful fellow jock named Armani. Although they live in the same area, they've never met. Nev is joined by Angel Haze to help Harold get his perfect girl. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Hundra & Emily
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish. (S4, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Whitney & Bre
programme.desc: Whitney met Brenell on a LGBT website four years ago and is head-over-heels in love. Brenell refuses to video chat with her, and Whitney is desperate to know why. Nev and Max investigate. (S4, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Luis has fallen for a single mum, and now he's ready to take their online relationship to the next level. But first Nev and Max must help him make sure that she is who she says she is! (S5, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brendan loves McKenna, but failed attempts to connect have left him wondering if McKenna is for real. Nev teams with social media sensation Karrueche Tran to help Brendan uncover the truth. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: Dream Boy, Dream Job / Mr. & Mrs. Pratt
programme.desc: Whitney gets offered a chance at her dream job in New York. Lauren grows nostalgic when she learns her parents are selling their house in Laguna Beach. (S4, ep18)

programme.title: The Hills: I Heidi Take Thee Spencer / Don't Cry On Your Birthday
programme.desc: When Lauren and Heidi have a run-in, they put their feud aside and remember why they used to be friends. Justin shocks Audrina by whisking her away to Palm Springs! Last in the series. (S4, ep20)

programme.title: The Hills: Big Girls Don't Cry
programme.desc: Lauren heads to Laguna Beach to get advice from her mother over her recent situation. Audrina meets up with her former fling, Justin. Spencer proposes to Heidi. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: The City: Friends And Foe-Workers
programme.desc: When Whitney fights with Roxy at Miami Fashion Week, Kelly questions if they should work together. Erin expects Joe to come down hard on Olivia, but things don't go as she hoped. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The City: Forget About Boys

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 1
programme.desc: After sustaining serious injuries, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: To better camouflage themselves as real Fire Nation citizens, the kids check out a Fire Nation school. Also, Zuko confronts Uncle.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: The gang arrive at a suffering Fire Nation fishing village, and a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: Sokka feels that he is not contributing enough to the group, and searches for a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Zuko, Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee go on vacation at Lo and Li's beach house, where they learn a lot about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, the kids face a new enemy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts, but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: In a spooky village, Katara makes a special connection; the group investigate strange disappearances that occur during full moons.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: With the day of the eclipse upon them, the kids, along with a ragtag force of old friends, enact their long-planned invasion of the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Mean Machines
programme.desc: The hunt for the Eye of Sarnoth continues in the third of a four-parter with the Turtles in Groucho-like disguises. Shredder hooks up a fragment of the Eye to the computer Omnus.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Curse of the Evil Eye
programme.desc: Shredder is in control of the Eye of Sarnoth, enabling him to transmute matter. Shredder brings to life a dragon which soars through the air with shocked shellbacks Leonardo and Michelangelo aboard.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Case of the Killer Pizzas
programme.desc: The Turtles' favourite food, pizza, is also the source of their problem. Nasty, fanged creatures have been planted in pizza boxes! When the critters crack open their chrysalises, they become enormous.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: The Fly
programme.desc: Shredder sends April a rare duko plant that renders her unconscious. The Turtles seek a rare leaf that can serve as an antidote.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Invasion of the Punk Frogs
programme.desc: Mutagen, sent by Krang from Dimension X, changes four Florida frogs into half-human creatures four and a half feet tall. Shredder, training them in his evil ways, names them Attila the Frog, Genghis Frog, Rasputin the Mad Frog and Napoleon Bonafrog.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Splinter No More
programme.desc: Michelangelo senses that their mentor is &quot;mondo depressed&quot; and Donatello finds a way of changing back Splinter the rat to Yoshi the man.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): New York's Shiniest
programme.desc: Shredder taps into New York's computers to steal plans for robots and creates an army of robots to destroy the Turtles and loot the city.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Teenagers from Dimension X
programme.desc: Neutrino teens Kala, Zak and Eask arrive on Earth and alert the Turtles to Shredder's latest plan to make &quot;mindless zombies&quot; of the Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Catwoman from Channel 6
programme.desc: A matter transporter results in strange happenings including TV reporter April O'Neil being put into a cat-like state and a tiger chasing the Turtles and Splinter, their mentor-rat.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Return of the Technodrome
programme.desc: To bring the Technodrome back to Earth, Shredder is instructed to take over the Niagara Falls hydroelectric station.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Beneath These Streets
programme.desc: While the Turtles, in disguise, are at a movie, Shredder interrupts a press conference to steal a new medi-laser.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Second Chance

programme.title: Melrose Place: Lonely Hearts
programme.desc: (S01E008) Flirtation turns to frustration when Sandy finds herself being followed by a handsome young man named Paul after a particularly awkward date.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Responsibly Yours
programme.desc: (S01E009) Sticking around for the long haul becomes a test of courage for Billy when he dates a hot single mother, while Jake and Sandy question whether they have more in common than a fondness for sex.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Burned
programme.desc: (S01E010) Rhonda makes it her mission to help Billy after he's attacked in South Central, while Jake has difficulty getting past old wounds when his mother suddenly appears at his birthday.

programme.title: Melrose Place: A Broken Promise
programme.desc: (S01E011) Sometimes bad thing happen to good people, and it's up to a rambunctious puppy and a friendly red-headed medical colleague named Kimberly to remind Jane and Michael what really matters.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Polluted Affairs
programme.desc: (S01E012) Alison dives into a steamy new relationship with a passionate environmentalist, but when she comes up for air, she discovers that he may not be all he seems.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifers small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeffs sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Kids
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifers plans for a romantic weekend fall apart after they argue about their different feelings toward careers, finances, and kids. Meanwhile, Audrey is having second thoughts about why she and Jeff have waited so long to have children.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergills allergies, he goes to his sisters for the day. But she doesnt get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.desc: Liam and Renee investigate a dead pregnant woman missing her fetus. They discover a town that Da'an helped after a nuclear meltdown and a suspicious brother and sister who were part of an early experiment to combine human and Taelon DNA.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar

programme.title: The Lost World: Skin Deep
programme.desc: When Marguerite begins acting uncharacteristically nice, the group raises some questions. A stumbling dinosaur in the jungle holds the answer: an alien life force has begun controlling their bodies.

programme.title: The Lost World: London Calling
programme.desc: Nelson discovers a map that shows a way off the plateau, but he has doubts about leaving. The group has to outrun nomads as they follow the route out of the Lost Word.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Prisoner

programme.title: The Lost World: The Games
